resources.string: This is app that allows you to connect to any OpenMic Server, so you can use microphone from your phone as virtual microphone on your PC!
In order to use this phone as microphone in PC you need to‚Ä¶ give us permission to use microphone on your phone!

Android permissions sometimes can be weird, but in order to use Bluetooth in this app you need to give us permission to localization and devices nearby. Don\'t worry, it\'s optional - if you decline these permissions you will lose ability to connect to PC via Bluetooth. Wi-Fi and USB connections will still work fine!
Now you can connect to OpenMic Server and start using your phone as microphone in PC! If you haven\'t done that already, download and install OpenMic Server on your computer.
Application you are using is completely free and open source! It\'s community oriented project, so any contributions are welcome!

This version of OpenMic Client does not contain any closed-source code, it doesn\'t provide useful analytics to developer and does not contain ads.\n\nInstead of watching annoying ads - make an donation üòä if you find this app useful or if you make any professional use. Thanks!
